alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Pulaski; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dodge, northeastern Pulaski, southern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Royal, or 7 miles north of Cochran, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Chester, Dubois, Coley Station, Tarversville, Gresston, Empire, Yonkers, Mobley Crossing, Roddy, Baileys Park, Magnolia, Rowland, Royal, District Path, Paulk, Goldsboro, Rebie, Cary and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
